title: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: The display property of an item is not taking effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is supposed to be hidden, but it remains visible in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it should be hidden in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new emitter.
5. Open the generated PDF and verify that the label is not visible.
